ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Posible new items
ygData.msgSnippet: ... *snip quest info* ... If you are one of the few that can make these on your server, charge those quest goers 50k plat per rebreather.  Why such insanity?
ygData.messageBody:
>From: Lomack <lomack@...>
>Reply-To: EQ_Tinkering@egroups.com
>To: EQ_Tinkering@egroups.com
>Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Posible new items
>Date: Wed, 20 Sep 2000 07:24:51 -0400

*snip quest info*

>"Denken Strongpick says 'I would be willing to part with this very fine
>blade for; a keg of Vox tail ale, a block of permafrost to keep it cool and
>two new rebreathers to get this operation back underway."

If you are one of the few that can make these on your server, charge those
quest goers 50k plat per rebreather. Why such insanity? A boycott of
Verant's implementation of tinkering. This is a pretty amusing way to force
player interaction and trade skill use.
